# markitdown1

A simple CLI tool and library to batch convert documents into Markdown using `markitdown`.

## Install
```bash
pip install markitdown1
```

## CLI Usage
```bash
markitdown1 src output/markdown
```

## Python Usage
```python
from markitdown1 import convert_all_to_md
convert_all_to_md("src", "output/markdown")
```
